name: Octopus Quest
description:
Sleep to summon bonfires and regenerate health.
Avoid standing on the cold tiles, when character temperature fall below N value he will start taking damage.

Cut off all Octopus tentacles to win!

Steering:
Camera:
"WSAD" for movement
Mouse scroll to zoom in/out
"Q" and "E" for rotating
Left Ctrl and Left Shift for pitch

Game created for The Knights Of Unity "BBQ Game Jam" by Piotr "Lizandros" Stoch from Sleepy Monkey Studio. The topic was Cephalopod, Sleeping and Temperature.
